system.requirements:
Tier 1; is a Ministorum Priest or 10+ Insanity 
Aptitudes: Willpower, Offence
system.effect: Whenever this character spends a Fate Point to gain a +10 Bonus to a Test before Rolling, they gain +30 Instead.
